title: Ancient Greece
creator_credit: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: An introduction to life in Greece in 500 B.C. showing glimpses of the ancient cities of Greece as they now stand in ruin and as they would appear in restoration. Architecture, art, drama, and athletics are considered, and the major contributions Greece has made to philosophy, science, mathematics and government are listed. Suitable for upper primary school and lower secondary levels.
